backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing file/folder storage with blob management, access control, user approval workflow, profile management, admin functions, and storage statistics. Includes file/folder CRUD operations, search, move, rename, and recursive deletion with version tracking (0.4.109).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the removal of tooltips from three view mode toggle buttons in the toolbar while preserving all other button tooltips, affecting FileList.tsx component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files describing authentication flow, access control, file management UI, search functionality, profile setup, theme toggling, and component interactions.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template for the fget application with viewport meta tag and script entry point to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component orchestrating authentication via Internet Identity, access control bootstrapping, conditional rendering of pending approval/profile setup/file management screens, folder navigation state, and automatic query cleanup for unauthenticated or unapproved users.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Pending approval screen component displaying a clock icon, user's Principal ID with copy-to-clipboard functionality, and instructions to contact an administrator for access.
Empty file placeholder for admin management component.
frontend/src/components/FileGallery.tsx: Gallery view component rendering files and folders as cards with thumbnails, selection checkboxes, action dropdown menus (download, copy link, move, delete), and search result path navigation with clickable breadcrumbs.
frontend/src/components/FileList.tsx: Main file browser component that displays folder contents with support for file/folder operations (upload, delete, move, create), search, sorting, multiple selection, drag-and-drop, and toggleable grid/list view modes with per-folder view persistence.
frontend/src/components/FileListHeaderRo: Table header component for file list view with sortable columns (name, type, created, size), select-all checkbox, and optional location column for search results.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewModal: Modal dialog for previewing files (images, videos, audio, documents, text) with navigation between files, zoom/pan for images, fullscreen support, and download functionality.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Application footer displaying copyright, version number, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with app branding, authentication controls (Internet Identity login/logout), user profile display with copyable principal ID, theme toggle, and admin panel access for authorized users.
frontend/src/components/ManagePanel.tsx: Admin panel dialog for managing system members (add/remove users with roles), viewing storage statistics, displaying system info (version, canister IDs), with protection against deleting the first admin and auto-logout when current user is removed.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Initial profile setup form for new users to choose a unique username with real-time validation, debounced uniqueness checking, and error handling for duplicate usernames.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A button component that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes, displaying animated sun/moon icons from lucide-react.
frontend/src/components/ZoomPanViewer.ts: A container component that provides zoom (via mouse wheel) and pan (via click-drag) functionality for its children, with automatic reset when content changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessBootstrap.ts: Hook that automatically calls initializeAccessControl() once per authenticated session and invalidates access-related React Query caches after bootstrap completes, using sessionStorage to prevent duplicate calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, automatically invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout, managing identity state and delegation validity with configurable AuthClient options.
Hook that manages per-folder view mode (list or gallery) in memory for the current session, with each folder having its own independent view mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, file/folder management, admin functions, storage stats, and access control with derived access checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including sidebar, chart, and component-specific styling.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports the current application version string (0.4.133).
frontend/src/lib/canisterIds.ts: Utility functions to retrieve backend and frontend canister IDs from multiple sources including environment variables, URL parameters, hostname, and dfx-generated files.
frontend/src/lib/dragDropDirectory.ts: Handles drag-and-drop file and directory extraction using the FileSystem API, recursively traversing directories to collect files with their relative paths.
frontend/src/lib/fileLinks.ts: Provides utilities for generating direct download URLs, copying file links to clipboard, and downloading files with correct filenames using blob URLs.
frontend/src/lib/fileTypes.ts: Provides file type detection, MIME type mapping, and human-readable type labels based on file extensions, with category checks for images, videos, audio, documents, code, and archives.
frontend/src/lib/fileTypeTints.ts: Maps file categories and folders to theme-aware CSS tint classes for visual differentiation in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/folderNavigation.ts: Handles folder path resolution, breadcrumb generation, and navigation between folders using folder IDs and hierarchical relationships.
frontend/src/lib/folderUpload.ts: Manages recursive folder uploads by creating folder structures depth-first, then uploading non-empty files with progress tracking and empty file skipping.
frontend/src/lib/formatFileSize.ts: Formats byte sizes (number or bigint) into human-readable strings using base-1024 units (B, KB, MB, GB, TB).
frontend/src/lib/formatTime.ts: Converts backend Time values (bigint nanoseconds) to human-readable date/time strings in various formats using Intl.DateTimeFormat.
frontend/src/lib/id.ts: Generates cryptographically secure 32-byte random IDs as hex strings for file and folder identifiers.
frontend/src/lib/searchNormalize.ts: Normalizes text for Unicode-aware, case-insensitive, diacritics-insensitive search by decomposing characters and removing accents.
frontend/src/lib/sortFileSystemItems.ts: Exports a function to sort file system items by name, size, type, created, or updated date with deterministic tie-breakers (kind, name, id) for stable ordering.
frontend/src/lib/subtreeIndex.ts: Builds a set of folder IDs representing a subtree by creating a parent-to-children index and recursively traversing descendants from a given start folder.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens (using oklch), container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project metadata indicating a fix request to remove tooltips from three view mode toggle buttons in the toolbar while keeping all other button tooltips unchanged.
